data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chérot, F., Malipatil, M. B. (2016): A review of Adelphocoris - Creontiades - Megacoelum complex (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Mirini), with descriptions of two new genera and four new species. Zootaxa 4126 (2): 151-206, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4126.2.1
